ele.outerFind('.product-accordion li.section h3').attr({'role':'button','aria-expanded':'false', 'tabindex':'0'}).on('keydown', function(e) {
  if(e.keyCode === 13 || e.keyCode === 32) {
    e.preventDefault();
    this.click();
  }
}).click(function(){
  if($ae(this).attr('aria-expanded') === 'false') {
    //$ae('.product-accordion li').filter(':not(.active)').find('>h3').attr({'aria-expanded':'false'});
    $ae(this).attr('aria-expanded','true');
    
  } else {
    $ae(this).attr('aria-expanded','false');
    //ele.outerFind('.product-accordion li').not('.active').find('h3').attr({'aria-expanded':'false'});
  }
});

(function(){
    //This must run before the addHook function
    if(!AudioEye.addHook){return false;}
    //Beginning of the addHook function
    AudioEye.addHook("site-menu", "overrideSearchAlgo", function(conf) {
      //Here is where you set the menu that is to be overridden
      if (conf.selector === ".top-level") {
        return function(container) {
          var mainMenu = [];
          //$ae(#mainNav ol li a.mainNavItem).each(function(){
          $ae('.top-level > a').each(function(){
            var secondLevelItems = [];
            //var secondLevelSelector = $ae(#mainNavMegaMenu+$ae(this).parent().attr(data-pageid));
            var secondLevelSelector = $ae(this).next().find('a'); 
            secondLevelSelector.each(function(){
              secondLevelItems.push({elem: $ae(this)});
            });
            mainMenu.push({elem: $ae(this), items: secondLevelItems});
          });
          return mainMenu;
        };
      } //Close menu override
    }); //End AudioEye Addhook
  })(); //End Self Invoked Function
                    };

    $ae('#scroll-view button[test-data="close-modal-button"]').click(function() {
      AudioEye.focusElement(joe_return);

    }
  }, 300);

    i++;
    if(ele.outerFind('.discount .error-message').filter(':contains(valid)').length > 0) {
      $ae('.discount .error-message').attr('id', 'ae_discount_code_desc');
      $ae('.discount [name="code"]').attr('aria-describedby', 'ae_discount_code_desc');
      // Shifting focus removes error message...
      //AudioEye.focusElement('.discount [name="code"]');
      clearInterval(interval);
    }
    if(i >= 15) {
      clearInterval(interval);
    }
  }, 300);
});
ele.outerFind('.adyen-checkout__error-text').removeAttr('aria-hidden');
api.setAlt('.adyen-checkout__input > img', '');
ele.outerFind('#adyen-payment-block > h3').attr('id', 'ae_payment_radio_desc');
ele.outerFind('ul.adyen-checkout__payment-methods-list').attr('role', 'radiogroup');
ele.outerFind('.adyen-checkout__payment-method button.adyen-checkout__payment-method__header__title').attr({'role':'radio', 'tabindex':'-1', 'aria-checked':'false', 'aria-describedby':'ae_payment_radio_desc'}).on('keydown', function(e) {
  if(e.keyCode === 13 || e.keyCode === 32) {
    e.preventDefault();
    this.click();
  } else if(e.keyCode === 37 || e.keyCode === 38) {
    e.preventDefault();
    if($ae(this).closest('.adyen-checkout__payment-method').prev().length === 0) {
      AudioEye.focusElement($ae('.adyen-checkout__payment-method button.adyen-checkout__payment-method__header__title').filter(':visible:last')).click();
    } else {
      AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).closest('.adyen-checkout__payment-method').prev().find('button.adyen-checkout__payment-method__header__title')).click();
    }
  } else if(e.keyCode === 39 || e.keyCode === 40) {
    e.preventDefault();
    if($ae(this).closest('.adyen-checkout__payment-method').next().length === 0) {
      AudioEye.focusElement($ae('.adyen-checkout__payment-method button.adyen-checkout__payment-method__header__title').filter(':visible:first')).click();
    } else {
      AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).closest('.adyen-checkout__payment-method').next().find('button.adyen-checkout__payment-method__header__title')).click();
    }
  }
}).click(function() {
  setTimeout(function() {
    $ae('.adyen-checkout__payment-method button.adyen-checkout__payment-method__header__title').attr({'tabindex':'-1', 'aria-checked':'false'}).removeAttr('aria-expanded');
    $ae('.adyen-checkout__payment-method--selected button.adyen-checkout__payment-method__header__title').attr({'tabindex':'0', 'aria-checked':'true'});
  }, 100);
});
ele.outerFind('.adyen-checkout__payment-method--selected button.adyen-checkout__payment-method__header__title').attr({'tabindex':'0', 'aria-checked':'true'}).removeAttr('aria-expanded');
ele.outerFind('.adyen-checkout__payment-method__details button.adyen-checkout__button--pay').click(function() {
  setTimeout(function() {
    $ae('.adyen-checkout__payment-method__details .adyen-checkout__field').filter(':has(.adyen-checkout__error-text):first').each(function() {
      AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).find('input[name="holderName"], iframe[src*="checkoutshopper-live"]'));
    });
  }, 400);
});

// [IM-64143] Missing close button on cookie consent
ele.outerFind('#__layout .header-main a.secondary-menu-btn').click(function() {
  $ae('body').data('ae_refocus_el', $ae(this));
  var stopper = 0;
	var focus_interval = setInterval(function() {
    $ae('#__layout > nav[data-test="site-menu"] button.close').focus();
    AudioEye.modals.enableTabLoop('#__layout > nav[data-test="site-menu"]');
    $ae('#__layout > nav[data-test="site-menu"] button.close').attr({'role':'button', 'tabindex':'0', 'aria-label':'Close'});
    $ae('#__layout > nav[data-test="site-menu"] button.close').focus(function() {
      clearInterval(focus_interval);
    });
    if (stopper > 20) { clearInterval(focus_interval); }
    stopper++;
    }, 250);
  });
ele.outerFind('#__layout > nav[data-test="site-menu"] button.close').click(function() {
  AudioEye.focusElement($ae('body').data('ae_refocus_el'));
  AudioEye.modals.disableTabLoop('#__layout > nav[data-test="site-menu"]');
});

ele.outerFind('#__layout .header-main .header-desktop nav.navigation-main').attr('aria-label','Main');

  $ae('body').data('ae_refocus_el', $ae(this));
  var stopper = 0;
	var focus_interval = setInterval(function() {
    $ae('#product-page .product-view button.close').focus();
    AudioEye.modals.enableTabLoop('#product-page .product-view');
    $ae('#product-page .product-view button.close').attr({'role':'button', 'tabindex':'0', 'aria-label':'Close'});
    $ae('#product-page .product-view button.close').focus(function() {
      clearInterval(focus_interval);
    });
    if (stopper > 20) { clearInterval(focus_interval); }
    stopper++;
    }, 250);
  });

  AudioEye.focusElement($ae('body').data('ae_refocus_el'));
  AudioEye.modals.disableTabLoop('#product-page .product-view');
});

                    <script type="text/javascript">

                    var ae_f = function (ele, api) {
                      //ck focus function for menu
ele.outerFind('.filter-top-bar .desktop [data-test="open-all-filters-button"]').click(function(){
  setTimeout(function(){
    AudioEye.modals.enableTabLoop('.modal-wrapper aside.filter-menu');
    api.setAlt('aside.filter-menu button img.btn-img','');
    $ae('.modal-wrapper .filter-menu .accordion-container > .basic-dropdown.filter .header').attr({'role':'button','tabindex':'0','aria-expanded':'false'}).on('keydown', function(event) {
      if (event.keyCode === 13 || event.keyCode === 32) {
        event.preventDefault();
        $ae(this).click();
      }
    }).click(function(){
      //update checked state
      if($ae(this).attr('aria-expanded') === 'false') {
        $ae(this).attr('aria-expanded','true');
      }
      else if($ae(this).attr('aria-expanded') === 'true') {
        $ae(this).attr('aria-expanded','false');
      };
    });
    //ok button - send focus back to main trigger
    $ae('.modal-wrapper .filter-menu #accept-btn').click(function(){
      AudioEye.focusElement('.section-page .desktop button[data-test="open-all-filters-button"]')
    });
  },600);
});
//pills to modal focus functions
ele.outerFind('.filter-top-bar .desktop button.is-pill').click(function(event){
  let targetElement = $ae(this).text().trim();
  let triggerButton = $ae(this);
  setTimeout(function(){
    $ae('.modal-wrapper .filter-menu .accordion-container .filter').each(function(){
      if($ae(this).find('.title').text().trim() === targetElement) {
        AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this));
      }
    });
    //focus to button that opened the modal
    $ae('.modal-wrapper .filter-menu #accept-btn').click(function(){
      AudioEye.focusElement(triggerButton);
    });
  },500);
});

// [IM-64145] Radio buttons are missing labels.
ele.outerFind('.filter-menu .accordion-container .basic-dropdown').has('input[type="radio"]').each(function(i){
  $ae(this).find('.title').attr('id','ae-filter-radio-desc-' + i);
  $ae(this).find('input[tabindex]').removeAttr('tabindex aria-label');
  api.hideFromAT($ae(this).find('input'));
  $ae(this).find('.dropdown-content label').attr({'aria-describedby':'ae-filter-radio-desc-' + i,'role':'radio','tabindex':'0','aria-checked':'false'}).on('keydown',function(event){
    if(event.keyCode === 13 || event.keyCode === 32) {
      event.preventDefault()
      $ae(this).click();
    } else if(event.keyCode === 37 || event.keyCode === 38) {
      event.preventDefault();
      if($ae(this).prevAll('label').length === 0) {
        AudioEye.focusElement($ae('label').filter(':last'));
      } else {
        AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).prevAll('label').filter(':first'));
      }
    } else if(event.keyCode === 39 || event.keyCode === 40) {
      event.preventDefault();
      if($ae(this).nextAll('label').length === 0) {
        AudioEye.focusElement($ae('label').filter(':first'));
      } else {
        AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).nextAll('label').filter(':first'));
      }
    }
  }).click(function() {
    api.setAttr('.basic-dropdown label', {'tabindex':'-1', 'aria-checked':'false'});
    api.setAttr($ae(this), {'tabindex':'0', 'aria-checked':'true'});
    $ae(this).find('>input').click();
  });
});
//set up labels for radio buttons

  let label = $ae(this).find('span').text().trim();
  // $ae(this).find('input[type="radio"]').attr('aria-label', label);
  $ae(this).attr('aria-label', label);
});

                    <script type="text/javascript">

                    var ae_f = function (ele, api) {
                      // [IM-106493]
ele.outerFind('.lang-switcher button').click(function() {
    // store reference to trigger element
    $ae('body').data('ae_refocus_el', $ae(this));
    // try to send focus to our modal until it appears and receives focus
    var stopper = 0;
      var focus_interval = setInterval(function() {
      // send tab focus into the modal and then trap it
      $ae('.country-grid button').has('.flag').first().focus();
      AudioEye.modals.enableTabLoop('.modal');
      // make sure to have two fail-safe points for the interval
    //   $ae('.country-grid button').has('.flag').first().attr({'role':'button', 'tabindex':'0', 'aria-label':'Close'});
      $ae('.country-grid button').has('.flag').first().focus(function() {
        clearInterval(focus_interval);
      });
    if (stopper > 20) { clearInterval(focus_interval); }
    stopper++;
    }, 250);
  });
  // sends focus back to modal trigger element
  ele.outerFind('.country-grid button').has('.flag').click(function() {
    AudioEye.focusElement($ae('body').data('ae_refocus_el'));
    AudioEye.modals.disableTabLoop('.modal');
  });

                    <script type="text/javascript">

                    var ae_f = function (ele, api) {
                      // [IM-106514], [IM-106516]
ele.outerFind('.size-guide-overlay button.close-btn').attr(api.rmv);

ele.outerFind('.size-guide-overlay').attr({"role": "dialog", "aria-modal": "true"});

ele.outerFind('button.product-size-guide__btn').click(function() {
    // store reference to trigger element
    $ae('body').data('ae_refocus_el', $ae(this));
    // try to send focus to our modal until it appears and receives focus
    var stopper = 0;
      var focus_interval = setInterval(function() {
      // send tab focus into the modal and then trap it
      $ae('.size-guide-overlay .icon').focus();
      AudioEye.modals.enableTabLoop('.size-guide-overlay');
      // make sure to have two fail-safe points for the interval
      $ae('.size-guide-overlay .icon').attr({'role':'button', 'tabindex':'0', 'aria-label':'Close'});
      $ae('.size-guide-overlay .icon').focus(function() {
        clearInterval(focus_interval);
      });
    if (stopper > 20) { clearInterval(focus_interval); }
    stopper++;
    }, 250);
  });
  // sends focus back to modal trigger element
  ele.outerFind('.size-guide-overlay .icon').click(function() {
    AudioEye.focusElement($ae('body').data('ae_refocus_el'));
    AudioEye.modals.disableTabLoop('.size-guide-overlay');
  });

ele.outerFind('.size-guide-overlay .icon').keydown(function(e){
        if(e.keyCode === 13 || e.keyCode === 32){
            e.preventDefault()
            $ae(this).click()
        }
});

    $ae(this).attr({ 'tabindex': '-1', 'aria-checked': 'false' });
  }
});
ele.outerFind('.filter-bar__quick-filters ul li button.active').attr({ 'tabindex': '0', 'aria-checked': 'true' });

if (!$ae('.filter-bar__quick-filters ul li button.active')[0]) {
  $ae('.filter-bar__quick-filters ul li button').first().attr('tabindex', '0');
}

ele.outerFind('.filter-bar__quick-filters ul li button').attr({ 'role': 'radio' }).on('click keydown', function (e) {
  if (e.type === 'click' || e.keyCode === 13 || e.keyCode === 32) {
    setTimeout(function () {
      $ae('.filter-bar__quick-filters ul li button').attr({ 'tabindex': '-1', 'aria-checked': 'false' });
      $ae('.filter-bar__quick-filters ul li button.active').attr({ 'tabindex': '0', 'aria-checked': 'true' });
    }, 500);
  }

  if(e.keyCode === 37 || e.keyCode === 38){
   e.preventDefault();
   if($ae(this).parent().prev()[0]){
     AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).parent().prev().find('button'));
   }
   else{
     AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).closest('ul').find('button').last());
   }


 }
 if(e.keyCode === 39 || e.keyCode === 40){
   e.preventDefault();
   if($ae(this).parent().next()[0]){
     AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).parent().next().find('button'));
   }
   else {
     AudioEye.focusElement($ae(this).closest('ul').find('button').first());
   }
 }

});
                    };

  <button aria-label="Explore your accessibility options">
    <div style="display: none" class="ae-left">
      <span>Explore your accessibility options</span>
    </div>

      <span class="icomoon-wrapper">

          <span class="icomoon-cta ae-icon-launcher-universalaccess ae-initial-cta">
            <span class="icomoon-cta path1 a11y-icon-figure-and-border"></span>
